item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, May 28, 2025 at 3:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: My LLM CLI tool can run tools now, from Python code or plugins (231 points | 91 comments)
2. A UEFI app that sends LLDP-MED pkt at boot to negotiate PoE+ power before the OS (67 points | 3 comments)
3. Theory of Stupidity [pdf] (12 points | 2 comments)
4. Show HN: AutoThink – Boosts local LLM performance by 43% with adaptive reasoning (6 points | 1 comment)
5. Square Theory (467 points | 95 comments)
6. Look ma, no bubbles designing a low-latency megakernel for Llama-1B (64 points | 9 comments)
7. The Level Design Book (66 points | 8 comments)
8. OpenTPU: Open-Source Reimplementation of Google Tensor Processing Unit (TPU) (41 points | 4 comments)
9. Using Postgres pg_test_fsync tool for testing low latency writes (7 points | discuss)
10. A privilege escalation from Chrome extensions (2023) (14 points | 2 comments)
11. Pyrefly vs. Ty: Comparing Python's two new Rust-based type checkers (261 points | 109 comments)
12. Mustard Watches (1990) (41 points | 17 comments)
13. How a hawk learned to use traffic signals to hunt more successfully (342 points | 104 comments)
14. There Is No Diffie-Hellman but Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (42 points | 13 comments)
15. Running GPT-2 in WebGL: Rediscovering the Lost Art of GPU Shader Programming (106 points | 30 comments)
16. Space Selfie (94 points | 20 comments)
17. MailDock: Cold Email Infrastructure (3 points | 1 comment)
18. Nanoparticle-cell link enables EM wireless programming of transgene expression (11 points | discuss)
19. Launch HN: Relace (YC W23) – Models for fast and reliable codegen (76 points | 35 comments)
20. Why the original Macintosh had a screen resolution of 512×324 (124 points | 77 comments)
21. Direct Preference Optimization vs. RLHF (15 points | discuss)
22. BGP handling bug causes widespread internet routing instability (261 points | 121 comments)
23. Roundtable (YC S23) Is Hiring a Member of Technical Staff ( | hide)
24. LumoSQL (218 points | 78 comments)
25. The Hobby Computer Culture (100 points | 49 comments)
26. Restoring Vangelis's Performance Sequencers (7 points | discuss)
27. Ask HN: Is anyone using AI conversation partners? (4 points | 1 comment)
28. GitHub MCP exploited: Accessing private repositories via MCP (456 points | 277 comments)
29. Show HN: Lazy Tetris (312 points | 129 comments)
30. Semicolons bring the drama; that's why I love them (51 points | 43 comments)
